in_ports.name: input
in_ports.caption: external parameter
in_ports.hint:
Chain constant or one of external parameters of the chain.
When specified, this function simply returns a copy of this scalar (other arguments are ignored).

controls.name: value
controls.description: NOTE: you SHOULD specify system name of this function to use this block as an input parameter, if you are calling this chain as a chain from other solutions.
